src.engine.lighting

Class LightingEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.engine.lighting.LightingEngine

  • public class LightingEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which contains methods to actually perform lighting cone calculations for each LightSource in a world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LightingEngine() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(LightWorld world)
      Public-facing function which loops through each light source and computes its light cones using a sweepline algorithm over the points and segments in the world.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • LightingEngine

        public LightingEngine()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(LightWorld world)
        Public-facing function which loops through each light source and computes its light cones using a sweepline algorithm over the points and segments in the world.
        Parameters:
        world - The LightWorld object over which to perform lighting calculations
